Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, Serializable
public class Deck extends Object implements Observable, Serializable
Implementation of Deck for Model. A Deck is a group of Cards, all belonging the same Type.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck(CardType cardType)
      Constructor Method
      Parameters:
      cardType - : Type of the Cards contained inside the Deck

  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfCards

      public int getNumberOfCards()
      Getter Method for counter
      Returns:
      the number of Cards remaining inside the Deck

    • getCardType

      public CardType getCardType()
      Getter Method for cardType
      Returns:
      the type of Cards the Deck is made of

    • initDeck

      public static Deck initDeck(CardType type)
      Initializer Method. Creates and Initialized a Deck of the CardType specified as a parameter. The Deck is initialized with all the Cards of that CardType, all already initialized based on the parameters read from the data.json file.
      Parameters:
      type - : the CardType that will be contained inside the Deck.
      Returns:
      the initialized Deck, already shuffled.

    • shuffle

      public void shuffle()
      Shuffles in random order the Cards inside the Deck

    • draw

      public Card draw() throws NoSuchElementException
      Draws/Extracts a Card from the Deck. The drawn Card is the one at the TOP of the Deck. Once drawn, the Card is also removed from the ArrayList. If it's the last Card of the Deck, all its Listeners are notified that the Deck is empty.
      Returns:
      the drawn Card.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if there are 0 Cards left inside the Deck

    • getTopCard

      public Card getTopCard()
      Getter Method for the first Card inside the Deck. IT DOES NOT REMOVE THE CARD FROM THE DECK. Use draw() to get the Card AND remove it.
      Returns:
      the first Card inside the Deck.

    • getCopy

      public ArrayList<Card> getCopy()

    • setListener

      public void setListener(Listener listener)
      Method from the Observable interface. Adds listener to the ArrayList of Listener objects who are subscribed to the Deck.
      Specified by:
      setListener in interface Observable
      Parameters:
      listener - : object containing the lambda function to execute once the Deck is emptied.

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(Listener listener)
      Method from the Observable interface. Removes listener from the ArrayList of Listener objects, so that it doesn't get notified of its status anymore.
      Specified by:
      removeListener in interface Observable
      Parameters:
      listener - : object containing the lambda function to execute once the Deck is emptied

    • notifyListeners

      public void notifyListeners(String context)
      Method from the Observable interface. For each Listener inside the ArrayList, it calls the onEvent() method that runs the lambda contained in them.
      Specified by:
      notifyListeners in interface Observable
      Parameters:
      context - a string specifying which event has been triggered
